description: Dive into "Kamala's Coastal Bliss: Beachside Escapes" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Kamala's Coastal Bliss: Beachside Escapes

places.generalDescription: InterContinental Phuket Resort, an IHG Hotel, offers refined accommodations in a luxurious setting with an outdoor pool and beachfront bar. The Pine Beach Bar provides a vibrant beachside lounge for guests to relax with cocktails and enjoy stunning sunsets. On Sundays, the Pine Beach Club hosts a chic brunch experience with gourmet Thai cuisine, fusion dishes, and funky DJ tunes while kids can enjoy beach activities.

sources.snippet: The Intercontinental Phuket Resort, located on Kamala Beach, is a luxurious 5-star hotel that offers an unparalleled experience. The hotel is divided into two separate wings, each with its own unique vibe and situated on either side of the main road in Kamala. The smaller beachfront wing boasts a sleek, modern design and features amenities such as a swimming pool, a beach club, and a beachside restaurant.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Kamala?

places.name: InterContinental Phuket Resort by IHG

reviews.text:
We stayed here for four nights and thoroughly enjoyed our time at the property. As mentioned in other reviews, the resort is divided into two sides, but we didn't find the split to be an issue at all. The grounds are truly beautiful, and while the room layout is a bit unique, we found it charming and comfortable. The beds, in particular, were very comfortable, which made for restful nights.

The service was excellent throughout our stay. The front desk staff went above and beyond when we needed medical assistance due to an upset stomach-they quickly connected us with a nearby clinic and ensured we had what we needed. They also helped us locate a reliable laundry service, which we really appreciated.

One point of constructive feedback: the resort has a policy of no outside food or drink in the pool area near the beach. We had brought smoothies from a nearby caf√© and were told we couldn't enjoy them at our chairs, but could step just a few feet away to the tree line. While we understand the policy, it felt a bit rigid given the location's distance from other options (about a 5‚Äì10 minute walk each way).

That said, our overall experience was very positive. The property is just as described-relaxing, scenic, and well-maintained. We would happily return.

Just got back from a stay at Intercontinental Phuket Resort and honestly, I'm already missing it! The place is absolutely beautiful ‚Äì the design, the vibe, everything feels so calming and luxurious without being too over-the-top. The staff were super friendly and attentive, always smiling and happy to help with anything.

The food? Amazing. Every meal was delicious, especially the breakfast ‚Äì so many options and everything tasted fresh and well-made. We also had dinner by the beach, and the view of the sunset while eating was just perfect.

Special shoutout to the lovely staff who made our experience even better ‚Äì At Pinto, Sa, Mam, Nid, Dear, Preaw, Ball, and Fai took such great care of us during breakfast. And in the evening, Janny, Q, Ain, Stang, and Mas were all so friendly and attentive. Everyone was warm, smiling, and always ready to help ‚Äì we truly felt welcomed and well taken care of. üíõ

And speaking of the beach ‚Äì the view is next level. Crystal clear water, soft sand, and just such a peaceful atmosphere. It's one of those places that makes you feel like you're really on vacation.

Highly recommend if you're looking for a relaxing getaway with great service, great food, and a beautiful ocean view.

The hotel is located on Kamala Beach, a beautiful and very clean stretch of sand - perfect for relaxing. The resort itself is large and split into two sections, separated by a street, but connected by a convenient underground tunnel.

It offers great amenities, including a tennis court and several excellent restaurants with consistently good food. The service was top-notch throughout our stay. The hotel is definitely more family-friendly, and while the area around the resort is quiet with not much to do, it's ideal if you're looking for peace and relaxation.

places.address: 333, 333/3 Moo 3, Kamala Beach, 3, Kamala, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the vibrant Kamala area, Smile Bar is a beachfront restaurant and bar that offers a delightful dining experience. The recent renovations have enhanced its inviting ambiance, making it an ideal spot to savor delicious local and western dishes. With its prime location just across from the beach, patrons can relish their meals indoors or opt for limited outdoor seating. Additionally, guests can unwind on bean bags or cushions placed on the beach while enjoying refreshing drinks ordered from the restaurant.

sources.snippet: Smile Bar is a very popular beachfront restaurant and bar with a great location just across the beach and the sea. The place has been recently renovated and is brighter and very welcoming. The team is super friendly and speaks good English.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Kamala?

places.name: Smile Bar

reviews.text:
Great service and excellent food.  The premises is one of the better ones even with a shower to hose the sand off if you came from the beach like we did.  Atmosphere was great too with music playing.

One of the more expensive places to eat along here but you can understand why when you experience it.

Lunch for 5 with a drink each 3500 baht.

The staff were very friendly and welcoming, with warm smiles that made the restaurant feel very comfortable. The food was served quickly and tasted great. I ordered the papaya salad with a spiciness level of 2, and it was quite spicy-so I'd recommend going with level 1 if you're not used to Thai spice. I'll definitely come back again!

Absolutely loved our experience at Smile Bar! The food was outstanding ‚Äì full of flavour, beautifully presented, and clearly made with care. Every dish we ordered was a hit. The service was just as amazing ‚Äì warm, friendly, and genuinely attentive without being intrusive. The staff made us feel so welcome and comfortable throughout. Highly recommend this gem to anyone visiting Kamala ‚Äì it truly lives up to its name!

places.generalDescription: Caf√© Del Mar Phuket, located on Kamala Beach, offers a sophisticated and classy atmosphere for beach club enthusiasts. Despite being an unexpected location for the famous Ibiza nightlife brand, it has become a popular destination since its establishment in 2017. The choice of Kamala Beach over busier areas like Patong Beach provides a more relaxed ambiance while still attracting music lovers from across Phuket.

sources.snippet: One of Ibiza‚Äôs most iconic venues, Caf√© del Mar, has opened its doors in Kamala Beach with what is now one of the finest and most classy beach clubs in Phuket. A masterfully designed beachfront oasis for VIP chill-out experiences. From culinary delights to a-list international guest DJs, the venue is exactly what Phuket‚Äôs scene was missing.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach Phuket | all you need to know

sources.snippet: Caf√© Del Mar Phuket is one of the best beach clubs on the island. This well-known Ibiza brand found out this island was the right place for a beach party beach club with good music, great drinks and most of all, notorious parties.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Kamala?

sources.snippet: Located at 118/19 Moo3, Kamala Beach, Caf√© Del Mar is a popular spot for both locals and tourists. It offers a chic beach club experience with great music, excellent food, and refreshing drinks.
sources.shortName: Tranquil Retreat and Luxury Experiences in Phuket

sources.snippet: The Caf√© del Mar next to the HQ Beach Lounge is a more of a beach party club with a DJ and a fire show. Prices are at the higher end.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach - To Do & See

places.name: Caf√© del Mar Phuket Beach Club

reviews.text:
Review: Caf√© del Mar Suites & Penthouse

‚Ä¢	Check-in: Smooth and seamless with a very warm welcome from all staff. From the moment we arrived, we felt genuinely taken care of.
‚Ä¢	Room: Absolutely superb - spacious, luxurious, and equipped with high-tech facilities like ambient lighting and smart controls. Loved the thoughtful touch of welcome fruits and sweets upon arrival.
‚Ä¢	Service: 24-hour concierge available through the app made everything super convenient. Plus, guests receive a complimentary food voucher, which was a lovely bonus.
‚Ä¢	Experience & Perks: Staying here comes with the full party package - exclusive access to Caf√© del Mar Beach Club with all entry fees included. It really elevated the entire experience!

Trust me, this is more than just a stay - it's a lifestyle. Be that VIP guest with all the perks at Phuket's best beach club. Don't just read about it‚Ä¶ come live it.  ‚ú®üå¥ü•∞üëôü•Çüçç

Beautiful Hotel, Amazing Staff-But Management Disappointed Us on the Last Day

We had a wonderful stay at the hotel-everything from the ambiance to the service was exceptional. The rooms were stylish and comfortable, the amenities were top-notch, and the staff truly went above and beyond. A special thank you to Alina, who made our experience even more memorable with her kindness and professionalism. She was absolutely outstanding.

However, our last day left a bitter taste. We were unexpectedly denied access to the beach club due to a private event. While we understand these things happen, the way it was handled by the manager was incredibly disappointing. Instead of offering a solution or showing empathy, he kept repeating, ‚ÄúToday you will check out,‚Äù as if that excused everything. I explained that our entire reason for booking this stay was the beach club, and even if we were checking out, it was part of our experience. His tone was rude, dismissive, and completely unprofessional.

A beautiful place, but management needs serious improvement when it comes to guest relations-especially when issues arise. Without that, even the best hotel loses its magic.

Amazing restaurant. We arrived a little before sunset and went down to the beach to watch it and it was amazing. Relaxed and magical atmosphere. We made a reservation for 10 people for 7:00 PM and they waited for us and seated us exactly in the area we requested.The waiters were polite and explained all the dishes nicely. The food that arrived was perfect and delicious. In addition, they brought us a cake on the house and fireworks for the child who was celebrating his birthday and we made sure to tell them about it in advance.In short, a restaurant with a perfect atmosphere and amazing food.

places.generalDescription: Surin Beach is a stunning destination that captivates visitors with its pristine white sands and inviting turquoise waters. This picturesque beach not only provides comfortable chairs and umbrellas for rent but also features an array of street food vendors, making it a perfect spot to relax and indulge in local flavors. Nestled along Phuket's West Coast, Surin Beach is part of a breathtaking stretch that includes other beautiful beaches like Nai Yang, Naithon, and Mai Khao.

sources.snippet: Image Credit: User: (WT-shared) Jpatokal at wts wikivoyage, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons. Surin Beach was once a playground for the wealthy with exciting beach activities, active nightlife, great restaurants, massage salas, and eclectic shops. However, in 2016, a dispute between the beachside businesses and the government eventually led to the demolition of all the restaurants, beach bars and nightclubs.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Very Best Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach was originally a quaint little Muslim fishing village way back when and in fact, there is still fishermen working the sea there to this day. But tourism has taken over somewhat, particularly after the Tsunami. Kamala was badly smashed up in 2004, by the massive wave, and it took much longer for it to recover, due to it not being as popular as Patong Beach of course.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach - The Beaches of Phuket

sources.snippet: Head to Surin Beach, one of the best Phuket Beaches for beachfront dining. Surin Beach is a small, quiet beach located on the Andaman Sea Coast of Phuket. Often overlooked for its larger neighbors, Bang Tao to the north and Kamala Beach to the South, Surin is an 800m serene stretch of soft golden sand with shallow, calm waters, ideal for a family day at one of Phuket beaches.
sources.shortName: 10 Most Beautiful Phuket Beaches You'll Love in 2025
Where To Stay In Phuket, Thailand - Our 10 Favorite Beaches & Hotels

sources.snippet: If your family enjoys an active holiday, Surin Beach is a great choice. With its golden sand and turquoise waters, this beach is known among both locals and tourists for having great activities and some of the best sunsets in Phuket. The calm waters are perfect for swimming and water activities such as kayaking, windsurfing, and even learning to surf!
sources.shortName: Best Family-friendly Beaches In Phuket

sources.snippet: The 800-metre-long beach is a very popular destination for families and travelers that love to spend the day in a peaceful beach. It‚Äôs easy to know why is so popular. The beach retains its raw natural beauty because it is shaded mostly by coconut trees, soft white sand and clear tropical sea, making it one of the most beautiful beaches in Phuket.
sources.shortName: ‚ñ∑ 20 Most Beautiful Beaches in Phuket üå¥

sources.snippet: Surin Beach is a breathtaking stretch of white sand supervised by lifeguards, offering safety for all visitors. It's also a popular destination for experienced surfers due to its favorable surfing conditions. Laem Singh Beach is a sandy expanse within a bay surrounded by lush forests and palm trees, overseen by lifeguards for added safety.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Kamala

sources.snippet: Located just next to Surin beach, And is Around 15 minutes drive from The Famous Patong Beach, and 30 minutes drive from Phuket International Airport. This Beach is Very Famous for pre wedding Photography Sessions. You will find several Couples posing along the beach taking Shots for their weddings with full wedding dresses.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach in Phuket - Your complete Guide

sources.snippet: Surin Beach, before the big beach cleanup in 2014, you could not see the sand., GPS coordinates 8.035761, 98.275351. Until 2014, Surin Beach was home to some of the island‚Äôs most exclusive beach clubs and restaurants. It was so crowded that you could not see the sand for beach bars, restaurants, sun chairs, and umbrellas.
sources.shortName: Full list of Phuket's best beaches, find them here

sources.snippet: Further north, just a few kilometres away, the superb Surin Beach and Pansea Beach are further north. Surin is an immense natural beach with only one restaurant still available. Years ago, it used to be the place to dine and party at one of the many beach clubs, but all were declared illegally built and removed one day.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Kamala?

sources.snippet: Once famed for its great restaurants, hopping nightlife, and eclectic shops (including massage salas), it was the place to be. The Surin Beach of today looks much different. In 2016, a dispute between the government and beachside businesses led to a grand demolishing of shops and restaurants.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Phuket | PlanetWare

sources.snippet: As we journey south from Bangtao Beach, we arrive at the enclave of Surin Beach. This part of the coast is calm, clean, and beautiful, setting the scene for a memorable day at the beach. But with plenty of food and entertainment on offer too, there‚Äôs also a welcome lively atmosphere here.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Beautiful Beaches of Phuket

sources.snippet: Surin Beach is located on the west coast of Phuket and is about 20 minutes away from Phuket Airport. You will find a beautiful beach of white sand and clear water, lined with palm trees and a background of greenery. You can indulge in surfing, bathing and snorkeling on Surin Beach.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Scenic Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Surin beach is affectionately known as millionaires row for it‚Äôs high-end resorts, multi-million dollar villas and celebrity hangouts. For celeb-spotting, this is the beach for you. The sand is fine and white, and the sea is bright blue and clear.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches In Phuket For Families

sources.snippet: Surin Beach is appreciated for its clear waters and emerging beachfront restaurants, making it suitable for a diverse range of visitors. Its serene environment, along with a growing number of beach restaurant dining options, makes it a nice spot.
sources.shortName: Top Beaches Phuket | Discover the Best Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: I have not even mentioned Mai Khao beach, Naiharn beach, Banana Beach, Freedom beach ... I guess some more "beach" blog posts are needed, and I need more spare time for blogging, but like I say, I‚Äôm not really a beach bum.
sources.shortName: Phuket Beaches - Yes, we have a lot of Beaches!

sources.snippet: The water of Surin Beach is having unbelievable clarity and that is remarkable about it. it was a party beach some time ago. Today there are just a few eateries, bars, and restaurants here.
sources.shortName: 11 Most Popular Beaches in Phuket for Families

places.name: Surin Beach

reviews.text: Very nice beach, big waves when I went. Great for any sort of activities although looked good for quiet surfing as there was few people in the water.
Very nice beach, you can go for a walk on the rocks on the right side to admire the nice views and get some privacy for yourself. I recommend üôÇ
Great beach to take kids to. Water isn't to rough. There is a lot of construction going on at the beach front at the moment  but still a great place for a swim

places.generalDescription: Nestled along the stunning western coast of Phuket Island, Kamala Beach is a serene and picturesque sandy bay that offers a delightful escape from the bustling tourist hotspots. This hidden gem stretches for 2 kilometers and is framed by lush wooded hills, creating an idyllic backdrop for relaxation.

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach is known for its wide, sandy shorelines and calm, clear waters, making it an ideal spot for families and novice swimmers. The beach also offers a variety of local shops and restaurants, as well as the Kamala Tsunami Memorial, a site of reflection and learning about the 2004 tsunami. Surin Beach is a breathtaking stretch of white sand supervised by lifeguards, offering safety for all visitors.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Kamala

sources.snippet: Venturing further south, you‚Äôll discover the charming allure of Kamala Beach, a quaint coastal village steeped in local culture and hospitality. Here, traditional longtail boats bob gently on the twinkling waters, painting a vivid picture of Phuket‚Äôs rich maritime heritage. Kamala Beach is renowned for its laid-back atmosphere and family-friendly vibe, making it a popular choice for visitors of all ages.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Beautiful Beaches of Phuket

sources.snippet: There's nothing quite like curling up with a good book while lying on a hammock facing a vibrant sea. As the gentle breeze caresses your warm skin, you'll look up to find swimmers splashing in the calm water, children digging holes in the sand, and runners making you feel guilty for being idle as they rush past. While this beach isn't the most spectacular on this list, it's still beautiful and inviting.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Phuket | PlanetWare

sources.snippet: Some information may have been translated by Google Translate. Kamala Beach is located 6 km north of Patong Beach, south of Surin Beach and about a 10-minute drive from Patong Beach. If Patong Beach appeals to people who go for its drinking, Muay Thai fights and nightlife, then it can be said Kamala Beach is the perfect choice for visitors who prefer a clean, quiet and peaceful experience.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach Tickets [2025] - Promos, Prices, Reviews & Opening Hours

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach is another quiet and peaceful beach in Phuket that is well-known as the best place for travelers to do absolutely nothing but relax and enjoy Thailand's finest beach vibe in solitude. The town there is also not particularly special. It has great resorts like Cape Sienna Resort, but it doesn't have much to offer in terms of nightlife or activities like Jet Ski and paragliding.
sources.shortName: Phuket‚Äôs Prettiest Beaches: My Top 8 Picks

sources.snippet: Image Credit:  Jules Antonio, CC BY-SA 2.0, via Wikimedia Commons. A lovely clean beach with a gentle breeze caressing your skin, Kamala Beach is where lazy souls like to curl up on beach chairs or hammocks among the palm trees and marvel at the open sea. Though not the most beautiful beach, Kamala Beach is a perfect swimming beach for both adults and children.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Very Best Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Located in North-West Phuket, just West of the popular Patong, Kamala beach is one tranquil beach in Phuket that you certainly can‚Äôt miss out on. Kamala beach is a great option for all types of holiday-makers - friends, couples and families are all sure to enjoy their time on this beautiful, long and wide stretch of perfect beach.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Beaches in Phuket You Can‚Äôt Miss

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach is a rather unknown beach to many who visit Phuket‚Äôs shores. Kamala Beach is just ten minutes north of Patong Beach, but a world away from the, some might say, madness. If you have ever been to the Phuket Fantasea Show before, then you will have come through Kamala Beach, most probably without even knowing it.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach - The Beaches of Phuket

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach is a wide beach that stretches about 10 miles and situated to the north of Patong beach. The white sand beach is quieter than noisy and glittery Patong beach. However, the undeveloped beach is a perfect spot for tourists who wish to get relaxation and solitude on holiday due to its laid-back environment.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach | Phuket Beaches

sources.snippet: The first beach North of Patong (unless you count Kalim and Nakalay), Kamala is not as developed as the other 3 main Phuket beaches and being a largely Muslim community has a different feel. When I came to Phuket in 1999 I don‚Äôt think there were any bars in Kamala. It was hard enough to buy a beer in a local shop!.
sources.shortName: Phuket Beaches - Yes, we have a lot of Beaches!

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach is located right beside Patong Beach but it might as well be a world apart. Indeed, whereas its neighbor is constantly swarming with tourists and bustling with activity, Kamala Beach is less crowded and more laid-back, and as such, is preferred by couples, retirees and long-term vacationers to Phuket.
sources.siteName: Phuket Travel Guide | Discover the best things to do in Phuket
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach Information, Phuket Beaches

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach might be your perfect fit if you prefer a quieter beach vibe. Nestled between bustling Patong and laid-back Surin, Kamala offers a beautiful stretch of soft sand and gentle waves. Here, you can enjoy a more relaxed pace with the kids, renting paddleboards, or even taking a boat trip to nearby islands.
sources.shortName: Best Family-friendly Beaches In Phuket
Where To Stay In Phuket, Thailand - Our 10 Favorite Beaches & Hotels

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach is one of our favorite Phuket beaches and is ideal for anyone seeking a slice of paradise. It is the perfect blend of natural beauty and a laid-back atmosphere. The beach‚Äôs powdery white sand and crystal-clear waters create a tranquil oasis perfect for unwinding and soaking up the sun.
sources.shortName: 10 Most Beautiful Phuket Beaches You'll Love in 2025

sources.snippet:
Shop like the locals do at the Kamala Farmers Markets, try some of the local food and experience
the Thai way of life. These markets are like most local markets in Phuket. The Kamala Farmers market is located on the Main Road opposite the Big C and is open Tuesday, Wednesday and Sunday's.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach | What to do and where to stay at Kamala

sources.snippet: Kamala beach is just north of Patong beach, and is a quieter location for families looking for a more serene beach. The beach is surrounded by hills, a fishing village and is enclosed in a beautiful bay. The beach is dotted with smaller boutique hotels, holiday villas and private homes.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches In Phuket For Families

sources.snippet: Kamala beach is located about 12 km north of the lively Patong beach on the west coast of Phuket. The beach is superbly secluded in a turquoise bay with a curvy shape and incredibly clear water. The place is beautifully fringed by coconut trees and Casuarina with a tranquil atmosphere.
sources.shortName: ‚ñ∑ 20 Most Beautiful Beaches in Phuket üå¥

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach in Phuket is one of the most famous Beaches in Phuket. Located just next to Surin beach, And is Around 15 minutes drive from The Famous Patong Beach, and 30 minutes drive from Phuket International Airport. This Beach is Very Famous for pre wedding Photography Sessions.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach in Phuket - Your complete Guide

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach is a serene and picturesque destination on the west coast of Phuket. Known for its laid-back atmosphere, this beach is ideal for those seeking a peaceful escape. It‚Äôs perfect for a relaxed day by the sea, and it‚Äôs where I live, making it extra special.
sources.shortName: Tranquil Retreat and Luxury Experiences in Phuket

sources.snippet: Phuket Fantasea Park is a vast park amidst the village housing myriad shops and games. The park also hosts a fantastic stage that, fuelling various dance and elephant performances. One way to discover the authentic local Thai life is by visiting the Thai markets.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach, Phuket | Things to Do, Nightlife, Restaurants

sources.snippet: Kamala has a beautiful sandy beach lined with trees and sheltered by Kamala Bay. The water is shallow, making it very suitable for families with children. During the dry season from November until April the sea is calm and clear.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach - To Do & See

sources.snippet: When compared to its bustling neighbors, Kamala Beach has a more laid-back atmosphere. It‚Äôs a fantastic choice for couples and families who want a quieter holiday. Kamala Beach is situated about 9.5 kilometers north of Patong.
sources.shortName: Unveiling the Top 5 Family-Friendly Spots

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach also got a significant cleaning by the military in 2014. Going from a messy mix of small primitive beach bars and way too many sunbeds. Kamala Beach has now been transformed into something much better.
sources.shortName: Full list of Phuket's best beaches, find them here

sources.snippet: Kamala Beach is one of the best beaches in Phuket for families. It is close to the Phuket Fanta Sea theme park. There are budget hotels at the beach.
sources.shortName: 11 Most Popular Beaches in Phuket for Families
Kamala Beach Phuket | all you need to know
Kamala Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Kamala?

places.name: Kamala Beach

reviews.text: Gorgeous beach lovely just before sunset too, nice chilled atmosphere, u  an also do horse riding on beach, great place halfway down to book trips Delima travel we had a fantastic time at a great price would highly recommend this beach & also the travel place for trips

The area where the beach is located is quite popular among tourists - tourist operators work intensively with this place, accommodating vacationers from all over the world. But, it is believed that it is more popular with Europeans of ‚Äúrevered‚Äù age, as the hotels here are located near the sea and everything you need is within walking distance.

The beach stretches from north to south, its length is 2 km. It is famous for its beautiful nature and spaciousness. There are many attributes for active recreation.

The flora consists of trees of mixed species, - the air here is healthy, pleasant!

The water in the sea is greenish in color. Here are medium, in strength, waves. The depth of the entrance to the sea is above average. The sand is silty, gray in color. You need to walk far enough from the shore to get to the clear water.

The beach is subject to low tides - follow the tides in the appendix.

Full information with video and easy navigation - in the app üëâ PHUKETON

One of the best sunset views I've ever seen anywhere in the world-the sky keeps changing colors and it's absolutely mesmerizing. There are plenty of activities to enjoy along the beach. The only downside is the frequent approach from traders, which might interrupt the peaceful vibe for some visitors.

places.generalDescription: Freedom Beach, located in the lively Patong district, offers a serene and unspoiled setting. Accessible by boat or through an adventurous jungle trek, this 300m strip of white sand provides a peaceful escape from the crowds. With clear turquoise waters and lush greenery as its backdrop, it's an ideal spot for relaxation. Unlike other beaches on the island, Freedom Beach is free from noisy water activities like jet skiing and parasailing.

sources.snippet: A short, 10-minute ride in a long-tail boat will take you from the hustle and bustle of Patong (on the west coast) to the heart of tranquility at Freedom Beach. One of the cleanest beaches in Phuket, this hidden masterpiece is the reason you came to Thailand in the first place‚Äìto marvel at its picturesque, virtually untouched beauty. Freedom beach offers a throwback to the way Thailand was before tourism turned its enchanting shores into a tourist hot spot‚Äî-dotted with quiet beaches, immaculate sand, and an atmosphere of utter relaxation.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Phuket | PlanetWare

sources.snippet: Last but certainly not least, we unveil the hidden gem of Freedom Beach, a secluded paradise nestled amidst lush tropical foliage and towering cliffs. Accessible only by longtail boat during the high season (typically December to June), Freedom Beach offers a true escape from the ordinary, where pristine sands and azure waters beckon travellers to unwind and rejuvenate. The shortest route is from the southern end of Patong Beach, by Amari Phuket.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Beautiful Beaches of Phuket

sources.snippet: When you‚Äôve had your fill of booze, dance, and water sports at Patong Beach, and are instead looking for a tranquil white sandy beach, and to bathe in turquoise waters fringed with lush tropical greenery, head for Freedom Beach. Sitting on the west coast, Freedom Beach is a hidden masterpiece ‚Äì a postcard cliche. With no beach clubs, no beach resorts, and no wild parties, Freedom Beach is a place to relax and soak in the beauty of Mother Nature.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Very Best Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Last but not least, if you want to be in the midst of all the actions Phuket has to offer but despise being at a crowded beach like Patong Beach, I highly recommend renting a motorbike and driving to Freedom Beach. Freedom Beach is a remote white sand beach located only a few minutes' drive away from Patong Beach. It gives you the opportunity to escape from the bustle and crowds of Patong, allowing you to enjoy the tranquil beach vibe in peace.
sources.shortName: Phuket‚Äôs Prettiest Beaches: My Top 8 Picks

sources.snippet: Despite being located in the often crazy and crowded Patong, Freedom beach is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful beaches in Phuket - a slice of heaven amongst the chaos, which is often quite quiet and relaxing. The reason this beach is rarely crowded is that it is only accessible via a short but steep hike down a hill or by long-tail boat transfer during high season. It is worth the effort.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Beaches in Phuket You Can‚Äôt Miss

sources.snippet: Freedom Beach is probably the best beach in Phuket, and I am not talking only about the soft sand and clear water that is readily available everywhere on the island. The particularity of Freedom Beach is that you have to pass through the jungle to get there. Well, there are other ways, such as by boat or through the nearby hotel, but definitely, the hike is a fantastic experience.
sources.shortName: 10 Most Beautiful Phuket Beaches You'll Love in 2025

sources.snippet: Freedom Beach is located on the southwestern coast of Phuket, near Patong Beach. It‚Äôs accessible by 2 ways, either by longtail boat (You can rent the boat from Patong beach), or a somewhat challenging trek through the jungle. Freedom beach, compared to more popular and crowded beaches like Patong or Karon, this beach is known for its tranquil atmosphere.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Phuket - Where Should You Stay

sources.snippet: Accessible mainly by boat, Freedom Beach is renowned for its pristine sand and crystal-clear waters. This secluded beach in Phuket is one of the island‚Äôs most beautiful, offering a truly tranquil experience. The remote location adds to its charm, providing a serene retreat away from the busier tourist spots.
sources.shortName: Top Beaches Phuket | Discover the Best Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Freedom Beach, a 300-meter stretch of silky white sand and crystal-clear blue waters, is widely referred to as one of Phuket‚Äôs most stunning secret beaches. Despite its proximity to bustling Patong, the beach is surprisingly peaceful and calm. The secret of Freedom Beach‚Äôs tranquility lies in its location.
sources.shortName: Unveiling the Top 5 Family-Friendly Spots

sources.snippet: Accessible only by boat or a 30-minute downhill trek, Freedom Beach offers an escape from the crowds. Its seclusion makes it one of Phuket‚Äôs most pristine beaches, with excellent snorkeling opportunities in its clear, calm waters surrounded by thick jungle.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Scenic Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Freedom Beach is certainly one of the most beautiful beaches in Phuket. Nestled in a pristine hidden cove, the beach is blessed by its whitest sand and a cleanest water in all of Phuket. It‚Äôs great for snorkeling and for swimming or even for a short walk.
sources.shortName: ‚ñ∑ 20 Most Beautiful Beaches in Phuket üå¥

sources.snippet: It‚Äôs not a secret or hidden beach, but it can be hard to find, and there are only two ways to get there. The easy way is by longtail boat from one of the nearby beaches, and you have to pay for it. The other way is you can take the stairs.
sources.shortName: Full list of Phuket's best beaches, find them here

sources.snippet: You can visit this place coming by boat or you may visit coming downhill. At the end of the day and after the efforts, you will find that it is worth visiting this beach. Freedom Beach Address: Patong, Kathu, Phuket 83100, Thailand
sources.shortName: 11 Most Popular Beaches in Phuket for Families

places.name: Freedom Beach

reviews.text:
The descent to the beach is very difficult, and the return from the beach requires even more energy.

The length of the beach is approximately 330 meters - it is a small beach. It is immersed in the wild, tropical green of the jungle, it is very beautiful and interesting, its territory is divided into several areas by natural rock formations. There are few people and a lot of space.

The wide shoreline, hidden sunbeds and umbrellas, make this beautiful beach wild. Practically nothing has been changed here by human hands!

The flora is amazing: a large number of: different trees, massive shrubs, palm trees, beautiful stones and everything else.

The sand here is very soft, light in color. Turquoise, clear sea. Good depth and there are no low tides (watch the tides in the appendix)! Here is a coral reef, which is worth exploring, armed with a mask, snorkel and flippers.

Full information with video and easy navigation - in the app üëâ PHUKETON

The water is crystal clear and super clean gives off serious Fiji island vibes. Perfect spot for laying out under the sun, grabbing a cold drink, and just soaking in the view. No noisy water sports or banana boats, which is a huge plus if you're here to relax.
But fair warning: the hike up and down is no joke! It's steep and a bit rough, so definitely not for the faint-hearted. That said, if you're into adventure and don't mind breaking a sweat to get to paradise, it's 100% worth it. Feels like a hidden gem for beach lovers who enjoy a bit of a challenge.

This place was incredible but it is quite the journey to get to and from. We took a grab and I was quite nervous when we were driving in due to the steep, windy roads. They dropped us off at a booth that makes you pay 100 baht per person. After reading, they make you pay this for walking through their land to get to the beach. After walking about 10 minutes down some dirt path with stairs, we finally made it to some rocks that we had to climb down to get to the beach. Once there, we quickly realized why it was called freedom beach. There is weed everywhere, everyone is just chillin on towels and enjoying life. The vibes here are spot on and 100% worth the journey for couples and single people (not families). The journey back up seemed like it would be easier since there are stairs but the stairs were a joke because they led you to a pickup truck that costs 100 baht per person. The alternative was to climb up a mountain basically so my recommendation is to bring water and sneakers so you can get to and from the beach easily and safely. Also the grabs picking you up won't come all the way up to pick you up so that was quite a journey to navigate.

places.address: ‡∏ñ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡∏®‡∏¥‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ä, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Haad Laem Sing, also known as Laem Singh Beach, is a stunning hidden gem nestled in a secluded bay on the west coast of Phuket. Accessible by longtail boat or a rugged path, this golden sandy beach is surrounded by palm trees and large boulders, giving it a feeling of a secret paradise. While it has become more popular in recent years, it still remains one of the most scenic bays on the island.

sources.snippet: Laem Singh Beach is one of the most beautiful beaches in Phuket, nestled silently in a steep-sided bay between Kamala and Surin Beach. The hidden gem is totally surrounded by tropical jungle, blessed with soft sand and incredibly clear water. With the coconut trees leaning the beach and some giant granite boulders, it has the feel of a secret beach.
sources.shortName: ‚ñ∑ 20 Most Beautiful Beaches in Phuket üå¥

sources.snippet: Haad Laem Sing is located on the northwest coast of Phuket, very close to Surin Beach. The beach is surrounded by rocky areas make it a suitable spot for snorkeling. Visitors can explore the underwater world and encounter various marine species.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Phuket - Where Should You Stay

places.name: Haad Laem Sing

reviews.text:
This is a very nice and quiet beach with just a couple of sunbeds for rent, other than that it is not organized with anything. You can get there in 3 ways,  either by boat from Suring beach, or through the jungle or the best way is to
walk/hike for a few minutes from Surin beach following a path that indicates it goes to this beach (I managed the hike in flip flops). It is a pleasure to spend your day there if you ignore the trash left behind by others by the edge of the jungle along the beach. The sunset from this beach is very beautiful and you have a chance also during the day to play with the crabs on the the beach and maybe also to meet a monkey or two (I did not have this chance). You can go into the water without  water shoes easily in the first half of the beach.

Very beautiful beach. It was indeed quite empty, but I believe this is because of the sea waves.

The path to the beach is quite tricky, when the sea level is high, when it is lower, the trickiest part from Surin you can make just by the beach.

I added photos from this pathway to the review.

Also, please be careful, if you want to swim in the farthest part of the beach. There are a lot of underwater rocks and stones, When sea level is low and waves it is very easy to hurt yourself with such stones

My FAVOURITE beach in Phuket. There are a few people but nothing like Freedom beach. It's so peaceful. Make sure to get the mango smoothie from the restaurant it was the best we've ever had. You can walk there from surin beach it's 15 minutes and it's pretty easy to walk. 100% recommend ;)

places.generalDescription: Ayara Kamala Resort & Spa is a luxurious hillside hotel offering stunning sea views and top-notch dining options. Situated in the peaceful Kamala Bay on the west coast of Phuket Island, this resort provides a serene retreat with its own private beach. The rooms and villas are elegantly designed with a sophisticated Thai ambiance, all facing the ocean for guests to enjoy the tranquility of Andaman Sea.

sources.snippet: Ayara Kamala Resort is perfect for that romantic getaway, this 5 star resort is built on the hillside at the southern end of Kamala Bay with breathtaking ocean views. There is a selection of private pool villas or a deluxe room with Jacuzzi.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach | What to do and where to stay at Kamala

places.name: Ayara Kamala Resort

reviews.text: Really enjoyed my stay at this resort. The bed was big and comfortable and the room was incredible. It was very clean and had a great view. The bathtub was big and luxurious. The balcony and view of the ocean were amazing. The mini-bar is well stocked with all kinds of fun treats. I loved how remote it seemed, but it was also easy to take the shuttle to Kamala Beach. I booked a couple tours and they all easily picked up at the hotel. I ordered room service and the meal was great and came very fast. Breakfast at the main restaurant was also really good with a ton of creative choices. The staff communicated with me through WhatsApp, which was really helpful and made my stay even easier. I also used the laundry service, which was great.

This resort was awesome. It was under construction while we were there; however, that did not affect the service that was provided. This resort is a mountain side resort. There are a lot of inclines and stairs, so it may be challenging for a person with mobility issues. They have a shuttle that will pick you up from your room and take you to the front lobby and other areas on the resort. The food served at the restaurant was delicious. The spa was awesome. I got a great Thai oil massage. Hands down a great place to stay here in Phuket.

The place is simple and feels more like a basic villa than a full resort. The highlight of our stay was definitely the lovely and welcoming staff - they truly did their best to make us feel comfortable, and we really appreciated that. The view was also beautiful, but other than that, there wasn't much that stood out. Breakfast was quite minimal and lacked variety, especially for international guests. Overall, it's a peaceful spot, but don't expect luxury. The kindness of the staff made the experience warmer

places.address: 22/10 Moo 6, Layi-Nakalay Rd Kamala, Kathu, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Bang Tao Beach is a stunning destination on Phuket's west coast, known for its expansive shoreline adorned with soft white sands and crystal-clear blue waters. This beach offers the perfect blend of relaxation and activity, making it ideal for leisurely walks or invigorating runs along its compact sand. As you venture further north, you'll discover quieter spots that provide a serene escape from the busier areas.

sources.snippet: Home to the Laguna resorts and a couple of other hotels, but Bang Tao village is not close to the beach, so if you stay there you need to drive or take a taxi to find any local life or more dining options. The Laguna hotels are some of the best in Phuket. There are also some other great hotel options in the area - most are quite expensive resorts, though with late booking you can get a very good deal - see Bang Tao Beach Hotels.
sources.shortName: Phuket Beaches - Yes, we have a lot of Beaches!

sources.snippet: Bang Tao Beach is one of the longest in Phuket, as well as one of the best to capture a stunning sunset. This beautiful stretch of sand has become home to some of Phuket‚Äôs most luxurious resorts - and for good reason. If you are lucky enough to stay here you will be able to enjoy the many activities on offer from the beachfront resorts - from kayaking and sailing, to archery and enjoying their amazing spas.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Beaches in Phuket You Can‚Äôt Miss

sources.snippet: Bang Tao Beach is a long stretch of sand known for its luxury resorts and diverse water sports activities. This beach in Phuket offers a balanced mix of relaxation and adventure, making it suitable for both families and thrill-seekers. Whether you‚Äôre looking to unwind by the shore or engage in exciting water activities, Bang Tao Beach provides an inviting and versatile experience for all visitors.
sources.shortName: Top Beaches Phuket | Discover the Best Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Located just next to the exclusive Pansea Beach, it‚Äôs a beautifully stretch of sand, fringed by Casuarina Pines and incredibly clear turquoise waters especially in high season. It‚Äôs a great beach for swimming and for taking long walks breathing the sea breeze. Bangtao Beach is one of the longest beaches, and also one of the most beautiful beaches in Phuket.
sources.shortName: ‚ñ∑ 20 Most Beautiful Beaches in Phuket üå¥

sources.snippet: When you come from the north, Bang Tao Beach is the first beach where you start to see serious beach action. Apart from offering everything in traditional water attractions like Jet-ski Parasailing and so on, it is also on Bang Tao Beach that you can find some of Phuket‚Äôs famous beach clubs. There are several luxury resorts behind the beach.
sources.shortName: Full list of Phuket's best beaches, find them here

sources.snippet: Nestled along the island‚Äôs western coast lies the serene expanse of Bangtao Beach. Stretching over six kilometres, this picturesque shoreline offers a more tranquil escape from the bustling crowds of its famous neighbour to the south, Patong Beach. As such, it‚Äôs perfect for those seeking solitude while surrounded by gorgeous scenery.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Beautiful Beaches of Phuket
Where To Stay In Phuket, Thailand - Our 10 Favorite Beaches & Hotels

sources.snippet: If a staycation is what your family is interested in, then Bangtao Beach is for you. This beach houses some of the best hotels that can be found in Phuket, making it ideal for indoor stays. While the place also has other activities, the most popular ones are horse riding and eating at different restaurants.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Lining this beach are some of Phuket‚Äôs most luxurious resorts, including the Laguna Phuket, which is one of Asia‚Äôs biggest. This 6km stretch of beach is great for families. There‚Äôs plenty to see and do and you‚Äôll find a quiet place to call your own for the day as the kids play in the surf.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches In Phuket For Families

sources.snippet: Despite its close proximity to restaurants, stores, and resorts, Bang Tao beach remains relatively quiet and quite clean. Stretching more than six kilometers, this golden shore is the second longest beach on Phuket. It sits almost halfway between Phuket International Airport and Patong.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Phuket | PlanetWare

sources.snippet: Phuket‚Äôs second-longest beach, Bang Tao Beach, sits halfway between Patong and Phuket Airport. It‚Äôs one of the more popular Phuket beaches with a relaxing atmosphere. Perfect for honeymoon couples, Bang Tao Beach has scores of luxury villas and beachfront resorts on its southern side.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Very Best Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Bang Tao Beach is one of the longest beaches in Phuket, stretching 6 kilometers. It is perfect for long, peaceful walks and features a mix of high-end resorts and more modest local establishments, offering something for every budget.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Scenic Beaches in Phuket

sources.snippet: Bang Tao Beach is a long stretch of beach and it is not so much developed. There are a relatively lesser number of resorts here. the southern beach has some big hotels and restaurants.
sources.shortName: 11 Most Popular Beaches in Phuket for Families

places.name: Bang Tao Beach

reviews.text: We really liked this beach. Clean sand, water and calm atmosphere. There are no big crowds and you can peacefully walk along the long beach. Beautiful sunsets too.

Long beach, lots of bars food restuarants Go see the longtail boat guys at the hut at the bottom of the beach. Grab a boat and they will take you out for a ride to the island off shore, great snorkling

We came here outside of season and it was amazing. You do have to walk quite a bit to get to the green space with trees but if you prefer lying on the beach any place will be good. You can have a meal at any restaurant and use their sunbeds. Because we came in monsoon season the ocean is quite energetic and it's difficult to swim because of the waves. The temperature of the Ocean is amazing, so warm! I would highly recommend it.

places.generalDescription: Novotel Phuket Kamala Beach is a modern hotel offering a little slice of paradise with its direct beach access and stunning views of the Andaman Sea. Located next to the white sands of Kamala Bay, it provides a quiet beachfront location while still being close to the lively Patong area. The hotel features 166 rooms including Superior rooms, Suites, and various Villas with modern amenities. Guests can enjoy an outdoor pool, fitness center, spa, and a restaurant serving delicious food.

sources.snippet: ‚ÄòOn The Roof‚Äô is a vast and breezy rooftop with plenty of comfortable seating with the beach‚Äôs views. This rooftop is a great place to end the day with a cocktail or dinner, as the music is not as loud as in nearby beach clubs. Don‚Äôt miss the happy hour from 5.30 pm to 7.30 pm, two glasses for one‚Äôs price.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Kamala?

sources.snippet: The Novotel Kamala Beach Hotel is located at the northern end of Kamala beach, this family friendly resort is perfect for the whole family. This four star resort offers direct beach access and has a great selection of guest rooms, ocean suites and villas, including one and two bedroom pool villas.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach | What to do and where to stay at Kamala

places.name: Novotel Phuket Kamala Beach

reviews.text:
We really had a wonderful time here! All the staff we came across were extremely kind and always greeted us with a smile. The front desk staff especially Jerry was helpful and even recommended some great places to visit nearby.

We booked a Superior Ocean Side Room, and it exceeded our expectations. The room was clean, spacious, and comfortable, and from the balcony, we had a beautiful view of the beach. Beach access was also very convenient, just a short walk from the room.

Before arriving, we were a little anxious after reading some negative reviews, but our experience was exceptional. If you want your room made up, the staff comes promptly, and their app is super helpful for requesting extra water, amenities, room service, or restaurant services.

Our booking included breakfast, and there were plenty of varieties to choose from - the food was delicious! We also had dinner twice at Soul Kitchen, and the food was amazing, especially the mango salad - a must-try!

The beach was stunning, and the sunset views were breathtaking. On one rainy day, the beach wasn't as clean, but on other days, it was very well-maintained.

Overall, a fantastic stay - great service, delicious food, comfortable rooms, and a beautiful beach. Highly recommended! üåÖ

It was an average experience. We booked a Beach Villa; the view was normal not like the photos and the room had some insects and small ants on the bed. The air conditioning had an issue and wasn't cooling properly, but they fixed it quickly, and their response was excellent in that regard.

There were a few missing amenities compared to other hotels, such as tissues only available in the bathroom, and just one bath towel per person with no extras.

Overall, the staff service was excellent.
It was a pleasant experience, but would I
repeat it? I don't think so

the location is amazing, and the food from Soul Kitchen (lunch and dinner menu) are all very tasty. Breakfast buffet is average, I think they could probably do better but it's okay for the price. I suggest changing the blue placemat (‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏ô) at Soul Kitchen because they have lots of stains on them and feels quite dirty, although the restaurant itself seems quite clean. Live music at dinner time was great and the view was amazing. But while the live singer was resting, the music was not vibing and they also come with commercial ads (probably Youtube or Spotify ads) every 2-3 songs. I think the hotel should just invest in Spotify premium or Youtube premium to solve this issue because bad music really kills the vibe. Nevertheless, all the staff are very nice and helpful, I appreciate all of their help. One name I remember was Shuyaa, he's very polite and helpful. Every staff member here deserves a praise.

The public bathroom at the pool could be cleaner though. the floor is always wet. I think better sanitation would make this hotel even more pleasant.

places.generalDescription: The Bua Restaurant, located at the South end of Kamala Beach, offers a tranquil setting with stunning ocean views. The menu features a variety of Thai dishes, seafood, and delectable desserts like the apple crumble. Guests can savor green chicken curry, massaman curry, pomelo salad, tuna tartare, Tom Yum Goong, spring rolls and Pad Thai while enjoying picturesque beach views. Visitors have praised the open dining area with bay views and appreciated the attentive service.

sources.snippet: Right at the South end of the beach is The Bua Restaurant that serves Thai, vegetarian and fresh seafood. Enjoy dishes as green chicken curry, massaman curry, pomelo salad, tuna tartare, Tom Yum Goong, spring rolls and Pad Thai with good views of the beach.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach - To Do & See

places.name: The Bua Restaurant

reviews.text: The Best Thai food experience I had so far.  We ordered around 10 dishes and every single one was exceptional.  Food was so good I forgot to take some pictures.  Despite the mosquito issues, would definitely comeback with good mosquito repellent.  All is forgiven when food is this good.  4 of us spent over 2,900 bhat and was worth every bhat.

Absolutely fantastic Thai food in Kamala beach! I went here with my girl friends and we shared a green curry, Thai fish cakes, Thai omelette and some rice. The flavors were there! I will defs come back here again! Staff was extremely friendly and nice. We got free watermelon at the end. Very welcoming and beautiful restaurant.

We were looking for a restaurant to go next to our hotel and we ended up finding this quiet restaurant. This was one of the best restaurants we went while in Phuket. The food was DELICIOUS. I have no words to explain how tasty this was. The smoothie was so fresh and nice as well. The chef was really nice and friendly. I highly recommend this place!

places.address: ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≠‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‚Äã‡∏£‡∏™‚Äã‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‚Äã‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‚Äã ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏•‡∏≤‚Äã 16‚Äã/32‡∏´‡∏°‡∏π‡πà‚Äã 6‚Äã ‡∏ñ‡∏ô‡∏ô‚Äã, Na Hat Road, Kamala, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Spicy Bar Kamala Beach Phuket has become a vibrant part of the area's nightlife scene, with popular spots like Cafe Del Mar and HQ Beach Club nearby. Despite the modern additions, there's still a touch of traditional Phuket nightlife to be found. The bar offers fantastic quality and service, with a range of products that are highly regarded by visitors. Opening in the afternoon or early evening, it provides an ideal setting for enjoying the sunset on the beach.

sources.snippet: Until recently the nightlife at Kamala was rather laidback with a few reggae bars and restaurants, however with the opening of Caf√© Del Mar Beach Club   and Pine Beach Bar the nightlife around Kamala has certainly ramped up. For cheap drinks you must visit the Kamala Beer Garden between 4.00 pm and 8.00 pm and listen to the live music in the open air bar. If you are after more adventurous and fun nightlife in Phuket, I would head to Patong and Bangla Road.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach | What to do and where to stay at Kamala

sources.snippet: Although a secluded beach, Kamala beach has evolved drastically after HQ beach Club and Cafe del Mar set its base on the beach. Since Kamala beach is located in Phuket, one can witness a wee bit of old-fashioned nightlife and a lot of colour in the area.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach, Phuket | Things to Do, Nightlife, Restaurants

sources.snippet: Kamala beach nightlife has evolved a lot since the arrival of Cafe Del Mar. After all, there is still a bit of old-fashioned nightlife, and you are still in Phuket. Few ladies will probably call you ‚ÄúHello, welcome!
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Kamala?

places.name: Spicy bar Kamala beach Phuket

reviews.text: Spicy Bar is a lovely little place on the beach. Staff are super friendly, and prices are good. Passionfruit shake is amazing.

This place is awesome, basically garden chairs on a beach with a good selection of cocktails for very reasonable prices, what more can you wish for? Great place to watch the sun set over the Andaman sea!

Fabulous beach front bar, with friendly staff, great atmosphere and really good price. Spent several nights here after a dinner, really chilled beach bar. Special mention to Lin who is a super friendly informative guy, always willing to have a chat he is an absolute asset to smile bar.

places.address: Beach Road, Kamala, Kathu District, Phuket 83120, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled on the western cliffside of Kamala Bay, Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort offers a luxurious hillside retreat with stunning sea views. The resort features three dining options, a lavish spa, and one of the longest infinity pools in Phuket. Getting around the property is effortless with buggy service available. The bohemian-style rooftop restaurant provides a delightful dining experience with comfortable seating and a variety of culinary delights, accompanied by funky Latin music and scenic views.

sources.snippet: The Hyatt Regency Resort is located on a hillside at the southern end of kamala Beach. This 5-star resort offers stunning views, a large infinity pool overlooking Kamala Beach, a pool bar, kabanas, spa treatments a fitness centre and so much more. This resort is well suited for all travelers and is perfect for family vacations.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach | What to do and where to stay at Kamala

places.name: Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort

reviews.text:
We had an amazing stay! The view was outstanding ! The service was truly outstanding. Special thanks to Micky from Recreation, who made our trip unforgettable with a fantastic guided hike - and even treated me to a great coffee afterward!
The Marine Discovery Centre is a brilliant concept. My kids absolutely loved building their own aquariums, feeding jellyfish, and learning about sea urchins. It's both educational and fun - a big highlight of our stay.

Our family room was spacious and comfortable, although it's worth noting that the privacy design favors the kids' room, not the parents - something to keep in mind for families.

Huge thanks as well to Tee  for being so welcoming and helpful, and to Pure from the Spa for the warm hospitality and Disney from recreation for the yoga. Check-in and check-out were smooth, and the concierge team went above and beyond throughout our visit.

Highly recommended for families looking for a mix of comfort, activities, and excellent service!

Overall great experience! All the staff we met were so polite and helpful. Special thanks to the buggy drivers who appeared rain or shine, day and night. It was raining quite a bit during our stay but they never fail to provide prompt services.

The Pool House Kitchen was great, their breakfast buffet has a wide selection, with minor changes daily. Food quality was good too. The dinner was also great, with kids menu as well.

Rooms were really a hit and miss; some rooms were higher up on the hill offering better views, some had no views at all and were sort of at the "basement" of that block.
The entire compound is on a hill so there are no lifts, hence the need for buggies to ferry guests. We were fortunate to visit during lull season, so there were no delays. But I can imagine during peak season when the hotel is full, there will definitely be waiting time. It is possible to walk down hill to the main restaurants and pool but walking up hill is a real climb. Room cleanliness is alright, floor tiles looked a bit dated. Overall still good! Would recommend for families with young children, but need maybe visit during off peak season.

An exceptional hotel with outstanding staff and hospitality.

The rooms were among the best we have experienced worldwide. We stayed in a family bunk room and were delighted to receive an upgrade to an ocean view - a truly memorable experience.

The staff, especially Ms. Kwan at the front desk, were extraordinary, going above and beyond to ensure our comfort. The manager also checked in with us multiple times, demonstrating genuine care and attention.

The food was excellent, and the overall experience exceeded our expectations. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area.

places.generalDescription: Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas is a 5-star resort located on Kamala Beach, offering stunning sea views and a stylish, modern atmosphere. The hotel provides an outstanding experience from the moment you arrive, with cheerful and helpful staff. The rooms offer sublime views, and the resort features an outdoor pool, gym, and spa. Guests can enjoy upmarket dining options and bars while feeling relaxed in this peaceful sanctuary away from the city's hustle and bustle.

sources.snippet: Cape Sienna is located on a hillside capturing stunning ocean views from every room. This 5 star resort is ideal if you are searching for a relaxing and romantic place to stay. This resort is best suited for couples, it is not recommend for families travelling with young children.
sources.shortName: Kamala Beach | What to do and where to stay at Kamala

places.name: Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas

reviews.text:
Absolutely love our stay in this hotel!

The location is ideal, if you don't have any mobility issues. It's about 1 km to the beach, and the hotel is a bit uphill, but not much so it's kind of a perfect walk after breakfast.

The best part of view from the room. It is absolutely stunning, we spent many evenings chilling at the balcony üç∑üç∑

Breakfast is very good, pretty diverse, fruits, vegetables, everything you need

The rooms themselves were also great

The staff is wonderful and friendly, we loved it.

Definitely recommend it

A Wonderful Stay!

I absolutely loved my stay at this hotel. The pool was lovely, and my room was really nice with a beautiful view that made every morning special. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, which made the experience even better. Breakfast was delicious and had a great variety. The location is perfect-close to everything I needed. Just a great overall experience. I would definitely come back!

What can I say that probably hasn't been said. For someone that has travelled to Thailand for 30 years now, whether this is your first trip or a repeat visitor, I would highly recommend this Hotel as the perfect experience. The staff are all super friendly and very helpful, in particular Yuth, who manages the breakfast / operations seamlessly, and Doe (who literally saved a child from drowning while serving drinks with no concern for his iPhone that was in his pocket) as well as the magnificent room service menu (try the humus with lamb) as well as one of the best receptions, pool area that I've experienced. The fact that they are elevated makes the cool breeze set the scene for your stay as well as good vibes that run through the hotel. I've re-booked already and was really blessed to have managed to stay here. Bravo to all the team !!!
